column4: My Rhythmbox doesn't play MP3s (complains no plugin)... how do I make this work?
yea, I was surprised so many people showed up around finals... 30 people came
wow, I just found a _nasty_ bug with GtkFileChooser widget

I have this long folder name for an MP3 album, and if I enter the directory that contains it, the GtkFileChooser widget infinite loops resizing the file display area (bigger, smaller, bigger, smaller) and freezes up.
dpkg -l libgtk2.0-0|grep ^ii|awk -F' ' '{print $3}'
2.4.10-1ubuntu
yep
similar issue fixed in newer libgtk?
so bug report exists, you know the #?
seems so, but I'm tracking hoary
not off the top of my head, sorry
no problem, I won't report it then to avoid triage...
I'll try to find the bug report on gnome.org
ah, okay, so it's very possible it was fixed in between if you can't reproduce
dist-upgrade after update
right...
that's correct.
of course.
is it not a separate module?
it is.
I don't see it under /lib/modules/.../
did you clobber it? It most certainly exists.
I must have, I was playing with alsa drivers from source at some point
I'll sort it out, thanks for the sanity check
